story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_0200:
I don’t see anything worth noting, and we still
don’t know where Paulo is...
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_0400: Paulo! I’m so glad you’re safe!
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_0600:
No, I should be the one apologizing. I should’ve
made sure we were all together.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_0700:
But you did great, getting through all those grunts
on your own!
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_0900: That aside, what in the world is going on here?
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_1300:
I ran here as fast as I could. I’ve got some bad
news, kids.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_1400: While we were all out looking for Team Rocket...
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_1700: By the time we got to her lab, nobody was there.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_1800: Darn... They pulled a fast one on us.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2000:
We sent our strongest Gym Leaders and
Elite Four members all over Pasio to find
Team Rocket.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2100:
They must’ve been planning to raid the lab all
along... They were just waiting until we were
stretched thin!
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2200:
Gathering a bunch of grunts here in the ruins
must’ve been part of that plan.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2500: Blue... I have something to tell you.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2700: On my way here, I saw Paulo.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2800:
I noticed he was talking to one of those Team
Rocket grunts.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_2900:
Hopefully, it doesn’t mean anything bad...but I
thought you ought to know all the same.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_3000:
Heh. You’re as cautious as ever. I appreciate
it, though.
story_teamrocket_01_05000/2401_1201_3100:
We don’t have a solid reason to confront him
about it yet...but we can keep an eye on him
for now.
